comment: Everyday in I will randomly pick someone on twitter and give them $ in cash or . Why ? To put a smile on someone s face and for me to develop a habit of giving . Leave your CashApp , PayPal or BTC addy and please retweet .
amr:
# ::snt Everyday in I will randomly pick someone on twitter and give them $ in cash or . Why ? To put a smile on someone s face and for me to develop a habit of giving . Leave your CashApp , PayPal or BTC addy and please retweet .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (p / pick-up-04
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (s / someone)
                  :ARG2 (p2 / publication
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Twitter"))
                  :manner (r / random)
                  :frequency (r2 / rate-entity-91
                        :ARG3 (t / temporal-quantity
                              :quant 1
                              :unit (d / day))))
            :op2 (g / give-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (m2 / monetary-quantity
                        :quant (x / $
                              :ARG1-of (c / cash-01))
                        :ARG2 s))
            :snt2 (c2 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (a2 / amr-unknown))
            :snt3 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (p3 / put-01
                        :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                        :ARG1 (s2 / smile-01)
                        :ARG2 (f / face
                              :part-of (s3 / someone)))
                  :op2 (d2 / develop-02
                        :ARG0 ii2
                        :ARG1 (h / habit
                              :mod (g2 / give-01))))
            :snt4 (a4 / and
                  :op1 (l / leave-15
                        :mode imperative
                        :ARG0 (y / you)
                        :ARG1 (o / or
                              :op1 (c3 / company
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "CashApp"))
                              :op2 (c4 / company
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "PayPal"))
                              :op3 (c5 / company
                                    :name (n4 / name
                                          :op1 " BTC"))
                              :poss y))
                  :op2 (r3 / retweet-01
                        :mode imperative
                        :polite +
                        :ARG0 y))))
